title: Innovative Mathematics Education Research and Instructional Design Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and at least three years of field experience
context.additional_context: Course for current math teachers and education practitioners to explore applying generative AI tools to actual instructional design processes. Designed with activity theory, emphasizing collaboration and self-reflection in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically define mathematics education research problems and design analysis processes using generative AI tools
Learners can reflect on the strengths and weaknesses of AI-integrated lesson design through autoethnographic research methods and produce reflective reports
Learners can critically evaluate and reconstruct generative AI-generated content within mathematics education contexts

resources: AI Educational Tool Access Accounts (ChatGPT, Copilot, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
